price: 49. Waxaanu dhab ahaan siinnay Muuse Kitaabka (Towraadda) si ay u hanuunaan6.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
